allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix PR review issues for Obsidian community plugin validation

- Fix unhandled promise in main.ts \(add void operator\)
- Replace any types with unknown in types.d.ts
- Fix template literal type error in yaml-parser.ts
- Simplify settings heading terminology
- Remove unused FreeTextQuestion import in scoring.ts
- Fix unused variable warning with exhaustive check pattern
- Remove unnecessary type assertions in quiz-modal.ts
- Prefix unused ctx parameter with underscore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix sentence case for UI text

- Change ''VRAI''/''FAUX'' to ''Vrai''/''Faux'' in true/false buttons
- Change ''Vrai / Faux'' to ''Vrai / faux'' in type badge
- Change ''Ollama \(Local\)'' to ''Ollama \(local\)'' in provider dropdown

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
